OOC: Don't worry  :)

BIC:

Blacknighmare::

Blacknighmare was flying to her base and she noticed the strange bot 
that was down,  she landed and as soon as Orchestra ended to play his 
music, blacknighmare screamed "BRAVO!!"

and walked towards the bot she asked kindly "Who're you?? and what 
are you doing here...?



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> OOC:  Damn!  I really messed up on my character's intros!  Sorry 
Airshadow!!!  I'll do a little correction with Orchestra, and pretend 
he didn't notice the base!  Again, sorry everybody!
> 
> Orchestra/Symphony
> 
>        Orchestra was worried.  What could've happened to his 
brothers?  Oh, anything could have happened.  They could've been 
blown off course by a strong wind.  They could've been destroyed by 
enemy transformers.
> 
>         "DAMN!!!!  I'VE WAITED SO LONG TO PLAY THIS 
MUSIC!!!!!!!!!!" He yelled out loud with anger.
> 
>          "AND WHY DID I HAVE TO LAND IN A STINKIN' VOLCANO!!!!!!!  
WHY???????" He yelled again.
> 
>           Orchestra pulled out a alien-like weapon which shot out 
blue plasma beams.
> 
>           "HEAR MY BOLERO OF THUNDER!!!  HEAR MY MINUET OF 
RAGE!!!!!!!" He yelled, this time firing his gun up at the air(the 
top of the volcano).
> 
>             He tapped a button on his gun, and it turned into an 
object resembling a violin.  Orchestra got out a stick and started 
playing fast-paced, violent sounding music on the violin.  Thunder 
could be heard outside of the volcano.  Inside the volcano, small 
streaks of lava appeared, growing a small bit bigger with every 
note.  As Orchestra's angry music went on, a circle of lava had 
formed around Orchestra.  This went on, until finally Orchestra 
finished his little piece of music.  The lava and other elements 
which the music had struck up disappeared.
>  
>             "Played by the great Orchestra!!!!" Orchestra yelled 
with pride, bowing to nobody and raising his violin in the air.  He 
turned the button back into a gun and put it away.
> 
> (Ok, if the base didn't hear that, then I don't know what to do
[Well, I do, but I'm trying to make you notice Orchestra so that he 
can get factioned])
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>       Symphony stopped his music, and then sent a message to all 
the Maximals of the CF through his com.
> 
>        "I wish to join you!  I come in peace, and I wish to join 
you!  You are my only chance at being heard!!!!" He begged.
